H0.text: What was the language of the Roman Empire. Greek

H1.text: What was the language of the Roman Empire. Italian

H2.text: What was the language of the Roman Empire. Etruscan

H3.text: What was the language of the Roman Empire. Latin

A4.text: Latin was the dominant language in the Italian Peninsula and subsequently throughout the Roman Empire.

A5.text: Latin was originally spoken by the Latins in Latium (now known as Lazio), the lower Tiber area around Rome, Italy.
